resources.string: On the Weather tab you can check the current weather of each county capital city. You can refresh the values by clicking on the refresh button.
If you press the + icon, the temperature value of the given city will be saved.
If you select a city from the list at the weather tab, the details view opens. You can check current weather related values, such as humidity, wind speed, etc.
At the History tab you can see the saved temperature values.
Are you sure you want to save weather details?
Are you sure you want to delete all saved weather details?
Are you sure you want to delete weather details?
